Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to residency restrictions for sex offenders
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to establish residency restrictions for sex offenders.
LawCode: Ren ยง168-w to be ยง168-x, add ยง168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing municipalities to establish residency restrictions for sex offenders
